name: Fraternite Notre Dame - Mary of Nazareth Soup Kitchen
description: Soup Kitchen offers 300 meals per day. Lunch Mon. Tues. Wed 11:30am - 1:30pm On Tuesday, from 3 to 6 pm, they serve in the street a full, hot meal to 200-250 homeless persons On Wednesday night, in another area, they serve about 50 persons.
